title: George Washington Memorial Parkway: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions & Transportation       The parkway was built as a scenic drive, but it is also a busy commuter route. Consider using public transportation to visit park sites, especially during morning and afternoon rush hours. Check out Travel Tips for advice about driving along the parkway.      Directions to Parkway Headquarters Parkway headquarters is located on the George Washington Memorial Parkway between the Central Intelligence Agency exit and the American Legion Bridge. By Car From the south, take the George Washington Memorial Parkway north. Just past the CIA exit turn right into the parking lot for the US Park Police and parkway headquarters. Go through the chain link fence and take an immediate right. Follow the road down to a stop sign and turn right into the parking lot for the headquarters building. From I-495, take exit 43 for the George Washington Memorial Parkway. Just past the exit for Turkey Run Park turn left into the parking lot for the US Park Police and parkway headquarters. Go through the chain link fence and take an immediate right. Follow the road down to a stop sign and turn right into the parking lot for the headquarters building. On Foot The Potomac Heritage National Scenic Trail passes behind parkway headquarters in Turkey Run Park just southeast of picnic area A.      Directions to Other Park Sites For directions to other destinations along the parkway visit the individual webpages for those sites.
